entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
